subject: Hockey, Ice
Ice
Fans (Airflow)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: As outdoor temperatures rise over the course of the N.H.L. playoffs, it becomes a greater challenge for crews at rinks to keep the ice cool and solid.
snippet: As outdoor temperatures rise over the course of the N.H.L. playoffs, it becomes a greater challenge for crews at rinks to keep the ice cool and solid.
